description: Take baked mac and cheese to the next level with this tasty recipe featuring swiss cheese, horseradish cream, chicken and broccoli.
name: Chicken And Broccoli Mac Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer mixture to baking dish. Sprinkle with breadcrumbs and drizzle with oil. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden. Serve with green salad.
